title: New: MIYNT – Civil War
body:
Sweden and electro-pop; a synonymous combination that has seen some incredible releases over the past few years.

Stockholm artist **MIYNT** is the latest addition to the nations roster and an impressive one at that. New track _Civil War_ is ripe with potential, it’s brooding vocals floating atop a its dark synthetic backbone that builds toward it’s climactic flurry of electronics.

_Civil War_ will be released August 21 as part of **MIYNT’s** debut 7″ white vinyl via B3SCI Records and will be coupled with track _Nick Drake._ Pre-order now [here](http://www.b3scirecords.com/product/b3sr-011-miynt-civil-war-nick-drake).

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
